title: New Britain (American map, 1916)
Additional Information: Shows a United States conquered by Britain and Japan. The map appeared on the cover of The Fatherland, a pro-German weekly paper established at the start of the war, with the title ‘New Map of the D.S.E. – Dependent States of England – Formerly U.S.A.’. It was published in response to Life magazine’s famous cover imagining the country conquered by the Central Powers and Japan.
